channel.title: "Loading - Please Wait."? Please help me out!
channel.description: Hi, I was just on my friends private server (MehScape) I logged off for a bit. Then When i logged back on a few minutes ago, I logged in. But, it froze at the "Loading Please wait" screen. And my screen is all black. WTF happened? Becuase when I created a new account and logged on, I had no problem. I could see and didn't have the black screen in my game window. WTF. Plz help me out!!! :confused: :confused:

item.title: "Loading - Please Wait."? Please help me out!
item.dc:creator: @rlb1595 rlb1595
item.description:
@rlb1595 wrote:

Dude, its an error in your account. I currently dont have the server files, so server wont be up for a while. PRETTY RETARDED!!! i just finally got mopar and im working to get Mehscape3 server files back >.<

Read full topic
item.source: "Loading - Please Wait."? Please help me out!

item.title: "Loading - Please Wait."? Please help me out!
item.dc:creator: @confused confused
item.description:
@confused wrote:

Yes That Or, You added people to your friends list when they had bugs on the server!

Hi, I was just on my friends private server (MehScape) I logged off for a bit. Then When i logged back on a few minutes ago, I logged in. But, it froze at the "Loading Please wait" screen. And my screen is all black. WTF happened?

Well, I’m assuming mehscape is beta software, so there will be many bugs.
